altTitles.en: When Will Ayumu Make His Move?

altTitles.ja: それでも歩は寄せてくる

altTitles.zh: 就算這樣，“步”還是靠了過來

altTitles.es-la: A pesar de todo, Ayumu lo sigue intentando

description.en:
From the author of Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san comes another sweet couple's comedy about Tanaka Ayumu, a first year high school student who is secretly in love with his senior, the president of the unofficial Shogi club, Yaotome Urushi. Tanaka vows to confess his feelings to Yaotome after he manages to defeat her in a game of shogi, but he's a beginner at the game and Yaotome always beats him. Meanwhile, she keeps trying to get Tanaka to admit his feelings, but he rarely allows his poker face to slip.  
  
Though the day of his victory is still nowhere to be seen, this is the story in which he may ‘checkmate’ her by other means.
description.fr:
Ayumu n'avouera ses sentiments à sa senpai que s'il la bat dans une partie de Shougi.  
Bien que le jour de la victoire semble très très loin, il va essayer de gagner par bien d'autres moyens.
description.ru: Эта история крутится вокруг двух членов клуба сёги: девушке, которая помешана на игре, и парне, который тайно влюблен в нее.
description.pt-br: Ayumu quer derrotar sua senpai no Shogi para poder confessar seus sentimentos a ela. Mas o dia de sua vitória ainda está distante. Essa é a história em que ele tem que fazer um “xeque-mate” nela de outra forma.

title.en: Kunoichi Tsubaki no Mune no Uchi

altTitles.ja: くノ一ツバキの胸の内

altTitles.en: In the Heart of Kunoichi Tsubaki

description.en:
The isolationist Akane Clan, composed of an all-girls body mainly consisting of young kunoichi in training, has a code to which they all must adhere:  
  
As men are beings of danger, to exchange with them is forbidden.  
  
Kunoichi Tsubaki, the leader of the Dog Squad, is an excellent trainee with a promising future, but she has started to experience a strange feeling in her heart… whenever the subject of boys is brought up.

altTitles.ja: ふだつきのキョーコちゃん

description.en:
Fudatsuki Kenji is known in his school for two things: for being a delinquent and a siscon. He constantly follows his little sister Kyoko around, fixing her giant ribbon, and chasing off any boys who might be interested in her.   
However, the truth is much stranger than what people believe: he doesn't actually have a crush on his sister. In fact, he likes Hibino, the only girl in his class who isn't afraid of him.
description.ru:
Фудацуки Кэндзи уже давно в школе считают хулиганом и сестролюбом. Причиной тому стало то, что он круглосуточно следит за своей сестрой Кёко, её гигантской лентой в волосах и отпугивает парней, которые заинтересованы в девушке. А ещё Кэндзи влюблен в Хибино-сан, единственную девушку, которая его не боится.   
Истина же в том, что его сестра буквально монстр. Она цзянши, то есть вампир — поэтому она гораздо сильнее человека и ей нужно пить кровь Кэндзи. Кёко носит ленту в волосах, которая сдерживает её аппетит и сильно влияет на личность своей хозяйки.  
Удастся ли Кэндзи сдержать в секрете силы своей сестры и получится ли что-нибудь с девушкой его мечты, Хибино-сан?
description.pt-br: Fudatsuki Kenji é conhecido na escola por duas coisas: por ser um delinquente e por ter um complexo de irmã. Ele sempre está grudado em sua irmã, Kyoko para cuidar dela e fazer de tudo que seu laço não se desfaça. O que acabou gerando uma fofoca em toda a escola que tem uma tara pela própria irmã.O que é uma grande mentira, ele não tem tara nenhuma pela irmã, mas tem um motivo para se protetor e principalmente com o laço dela, pois se o laço for desfeito algo de ruim pode acontecer. o que seria?

altTitles.en: Please Don't Bully Me, Nagatoro Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: イジるしかないっ！長瀞さん  Comic Anthology
そこイジるんすか、長瀞さん Comic Anthology
長瀞さんを、イジりたいっ‼︎ Comic Anthology

description.en:
Anthology from various doujin artists about Nagatoro and Senpai keeping to the theme of Nagatoro teasing Senpai and sometimes it backfiring on her.

Volume 4
1. *Does It Feel Good, Senpai?* by **Okinaga Umanosuke**
2. *Were You Hoping for It, Senpai?* by **Kimidori Hana**
3. *Do Not Grow Your Breasts without Thought.* by **Mozu**
4. *It’s Hot, but What’s Up, Senpai?* by **Haiba Nemumi**
5. *But This Is Obviously Your Drawing?* by **Ogushi Aritomo**
6. *I’ll Let You See, Senpai.* by **fu-ta**
7. *Senpai… What’s Going On Here…?* by **Zeroyon**
8. *I Love You Game* by **Yuichi**
9. *Welcome to Nagatoro’s Massage!* by **INU**
10. *If Nagatoro-San Changed into a Swimsuit.* by **Arato Asato**
11. *Do You Want to Be a Baby, Senpai?* by **Kurou**
12. *Can I Squeeze You?* by **Manno**
13. *Kouhai of the Dead* by **Magokoro Kurage**
14. *Nagatoro-San vs Senpai* by **Mizumi**
description.ru:
Антология с короткими историями от разных авторов на тему оригинальной манги "Не издевайся, Нагаторо-сан".  
  


---

- **Volume 1** (Nagatoro-san wo, Ijiritai!!)  
Chomoran, Cool Kyoushinja, Hiroe Rei, Hotondo Shindeiru, Konbu Wakame, Najima Keiji, Nanashi, Orimoto Mimana, Shimimaru, Suzumoto Kou, Uchiyama Atsushi(Attsun)  
- **Volume 2** (Soko Ijirunsuka, Nagatoro-san!)  
Azu, Katou Yuiichi, Kawamura Taku, Mochinchi, Nanashi, Okamoto Lynn, Sukeno Yoshiaki, Suzuki Kenya, Tanigawa Nico, tugeneko, Watanabe Shizumu, Yamamoto Souichirou  
- **Volume 3** (Ijirushikanai! Nagatoro-san)  
Manga: Sagara Riri, Nishide Kengoro, Andou Masaki (single page), Morishige Takuma, Enokidu/Enokids, Kumano Kyu, Sakurai Norio, Bimita  
Illustrations: Issiki/Isshiki, Kitada Ryouma, Souji Hougu, Namori, Nekoume, Yamada Yoshinobu  
- **Volume 4** (Motto Shiritai! Nagatoro-san!)  
Manga and Illustrations: 774 (Nanashi)  
- **Volume 5** (Ippai Misemasu! Nagatoro-san)  
Illustrations: Sugiura Jiro, Maki Keigo, CHANxCO, Honjou Raita, nonco, 774 (Nanashi)  
  
**Notes:**  
- The Artist/Author fields only accepted 19 names before failing which isn't ideal for anthologies so I've split them between the two

biography.en:
Lynn Okamoto (岡本倫, Okamoto Rin) is a Japanese manga artist and a former employee of Bandai. His most famous work is the series Elfen Lied which was adapted in a 13-episode anime series by the studio Arms. He lives in Tokyo, Japan.

The asteroid [49382 Lynnokamoto](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_minor_planets:_49001%E2%80%9350000#382) (1998 XG5) was named after him.

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.en: The Teasing Master Formerly Known As Takagi-san

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

description.en:
Years after  *[Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san](https://mangadex.org/title/13108/karakai-jouzu-no-takagi-san)*, Takagi and Nishikata are married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*

altTitles.vi: Nhất quỷ nhì ma, thứ ba Takagi

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の高木さん

description.en:
*If you blush, you lose!*  

Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   

And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end?  

*English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*
description.pt-br: Takagi-san, essa é a garota que se senta ao meu lado, sempre me provocando. Mas você vai ver, hoje é o dia que eu vou dar o troco e envergonhá-la!!

title.en: A Hero Can't Go on a Journey

altTitles.ja-ro: Tabi ni Dasasete Moraenai Yuusha no Manga

altTitles.ja: 旅に出させてもらえない勇者の漫画

description.en:
That's a story about a Hero and a Priest. Will he win a victory against her someday?  
That "one-shot" is the first chapter. It was originally posted on Twitter as one-shot, which would not have a sequel.
Hitomi stumbles upon an egg in the forest, and from it hatches Tokage-chan, a lizard girl who just wants to be recognized as a kaijuu.

altTitles.en: あしたは土曜日 春・夏
あしたは土曜日 秋・冬

description.en:
A slice of life comedy revolving around the conversations and daily shenanigans of three schoolgirls. Mina is lively and gets into mischief; Yukari is the class rep and usually follows Mina's lead; and Sanae is a member of the track club whom, unlike her friends, prefers to stay cool and act rationally. (From: MU)  
  
The first volume is Ashita wa Doyoubi: Spring - Summer   
The second volume is Ashita wa Doyoubi: Fall - Winter.

altTitles.ja-ro: Matsumoto Eeko wa Futsuu no Ko

altTitles.en: Matsumoto Eiko Is an Average Girl

altTitles.ja: 恋文－山本崇一朗短編集－
松本エーコは普通の子

description.en:
Collection of Yamamoto Souichirou's Oneshots  
  
1. Love Letter: Okamoto, a young middle schooler, wants to confess his love to a girl named Kamiyama through a love letter. However, things go out of his plan when Kamiyama shocks him with an unthinkable request.  
  
2. The Neighbor I've Longed for  
  
3. Middle-aged Cat Guy: Kazuki's sister brings home a stray cat, who is actually a middle aged man in disguise.  
  
4. A Wish for Sasa★  
  
5. Monster Lizard: Venturing into the hills to find her dog who ran away, Hitomi finds a strange lizard girl who is feeling lonely.  
  
6. Matsumoto Eiko Is an Average Girl: Oneshot about a girl's short-lived quest to become more interesting in order to catch her crush's attention.  
  
7. Witch in Training: Spring has arrived. Having just turned 13, the young witch Koharu has embarked on the traditional journey of independence. Now, she just needs someplace to crash.
